title: Wherever a property is developed or redeveloped, parking spaces at the scale laid down in these Regulations shall be provided
clause_text: Wherever a property is developed or redeveloped, parking spaces at the scale laid down in these Regulations shall be provided. When additions are made to an existing building, the new parking requirement will be reckoned with reference to the additional space only and not to the whole of the building and to the area where the use is changed.
